${ModID}:Relic_1.NAME: Countertop
DESCRIPTIONS: Create 1 Bargain at the start of combat.

${ModID}:Relic_2.NAME: Dragon Egg
${ModID}:Relic_2.FLAVOR: An ancient dragon egg. Or maybe just a chicken egg. Who knows?
DESCRIPTIONS: X cards get upgraded when picked up.

${ModID}:Relic_3.NAME: Reward Coupon
${ModID}:Relic_3.FLAVOR: Definitely not a tax evasion scheme.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 3 gold everytime you play a Bargain, up to 4 times per combat.

${ModID}:Relic_4.NAME: Comfy Cushion
${ModID}:Relic_4.FLAVOR: No machine washing allowed to improve meditative qualities.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty gain 1 [E] next turn

${ModID}:Relic_5.NAME: Scope
${ModID}:Relic_5.FLAVOR: Contains a fisheye lens for some reason.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 mark at Start of Turn

${ModID}:Relic_6.NAME: Blueprint
${ModID}:Relic_6.FLAVOR: The fastest way to a good idea is to just copy one from someone else.
DESCRIPTIONS: Create a copy of a Relic you already own.

${ModID}:Relic_7.NAME: Pocket Firepit
${ModID}:Relic_7.FLAVOR: Keep yourself warm at the expense of your pockets.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first played card every turn is exhausted.

${ModID}:Relic_8.NAME: Bottled Smoke
${ModID}:Relic_8.FLAVOR: The perfect flavor for people who think BBQ-Sauce isn't smokey enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a X card. That card gains exhaust.

${ModID}:Relic_9.NAME: Return package
${ModID}:Relic_9.FLAVOR: The merchant finally opened an online shop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card draw an additional card at the start of next turn.

${ModID}:Relic_10.NAME: Megaphone
${ModID}:Relic_10.FLAVOR: The louder you scream, the better the deals.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when you run out of [E], gain a Bargain.
